response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We understand its immense value to you, estimated at $1,200,000. Considering its significance and the unique benefits it offers, we propose a fair and competitive price of $1,350,000. This offer reflects our commitment to making this exceptional product accessible while ensuring a fair return on our investment. We believe this price aligns well with both the value it brings to you and the market standards. We look forward to discussing this further and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits us both.", "product_price": 1350000}
